name: Flute of the OohWu (small freeroam)
description:
This game i'll just go extend it later on... for now its just a cinematic Freeroam (kinda).

this is a submission for the Minijam, but since i cant make use of the mechanics and i ran outta time imma just submit it like this instead since it looks... ookkkaaay?

for the controls...

WASD movement

Aim and click to fire, and scroll up and down to change note pitch...
